name: The Butchers of Beta Penthe
description: Captain Tilly has burst into the Alpha Quadrant, and she has Ardra and Kes (playing host to Tieran) with her. They've already laid waste to the Beta Penthe system and freed the prisoners on Rura Penthe. Tilly and her allies must be stopped!
rules:
-- Choose which faction to support in this event! Unique Terran Empire and Klingon Empire missions are available during the event. Get Transmissions from Faction Centers to start them.
-- Using any version of Tilly, Kes, Ardra, or Terran Empire and Klingon crew will provide a bonus to Event Faction Missions.
-- Every Event Faction Mission you succeed at earns you Event Victory Points. Collect Victory Points to unlock Event Threshold Rewards.
-- In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
bonus_text: Crew Bonus: Tilly, Kes, Ardra, or Terran Empire and Klingon crew
rewards_teaser: Reach Rank 1 by gaining Victory Points from Event Faction Missions!

featured_crew.name: Archer
featured_crew.flavor: The anterograde amnesia from a parasitic infection leaves him confused and unable to serve as captain.

featured_crew.name: Ardra
featured_crew.flavor: A legendary devil-figure on Ventax II, a con artist impersonated her in order to take control of the planet.

rewards.name: Terran Empire Transmission
rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Terran Empire faction missions.

rewards.name: Klingon Empire Transmission
rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Klingon Empire faction missions.

rewards.name: Merits
rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.name: 10x S. Shuttle
rewards.flavor: 10 Standard Boosts. Go to Time Portal to collect!

rewards.name: Terran Empire Transmission
rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Terran Empire faction missions.

rewards.name: Klingon Empire Transmission
rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Klingon Empire faction missions.

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

rewards.name: Credits
rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

rewards.name: Merits
rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: Rarity
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 5 Polestars: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Super rare, Legendary

rewards.name: Skill
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 6 Polestars: Command, Diplomacy, Security, Engineering, Science, Medicine

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.name: Dilithium
rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

rewards.name: Honor
rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Ardra
rewards.flavor: A legendary devil-figure on Ventax II, a con artist impersonated her in order to take control of the planet.

rewards.name: Rarity
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 5 Polestars: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Super rare, Legendary

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.name: Dilithium
rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

rewards.name: Honor
rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Merits
rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

goals.flavor: Unleash the brutal wrath of the Terran Empire on Tilly.

potential_rewards.name: Terran Empire Transmission
potential_rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Terran Empire faction missions.

potential_rewards.name: Credits
potential_rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

goals.flavor: Let the Klingon Empire battle Tilly with honor.

potential_rewards.name: Klingon Empire Transmission
potential_rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Klingon Empire faction missions.

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

screens.text: "This is a message to all factions in the Alpha Quadrant: your time is up. We have already seized control of Beta Penthe. I will take all of the Alpha Quadrant and fell the weakling Federation and their lapdog allies, the Klingons."

"We have at our disposal the entire prison population of Rura Penthe, which you have discounted for too long. I will show you the firm hand with which a real leader guides his people. And for those who refuse us, the Ventaxians' own devil, Ardra, has been kind enough to join us."

"Such heinous disregard. She cannot be allowed to remain at large and must be brought to justice for what she has wrought. We of the Klingon Empire will teach her that true strength is born of honor."

"Indeed, we cannot allow her to remain at large. However, "The Witch of Wurna Minor" knows nothing of the honor your empire so loves. She knows only brutality, a shameful form of existence my own people once knew well. I fear only brutality in equal measure will subdue her."

"This is a message to all factions in the Alpha Quadrant: your time is up. We have already seized control of Beta Penthe. I will take all of the Alpha Quadrant and fell the weakling Federation and their lapdog allies, the Klingons."

"We have at our disposal the entire prison population of Rura Penthe, which you have discounted for too long. I will show you the firm hand with which a real leader guides his people. And for those who refuse us, the Ventaxians' own devil, Ardra, has been kind enough to join us."
